descriptions: No attempt to calculate caloric value.

Caloric calculation is attempted and is somewhat accurate, but contains noticeable errors or omissions.
Caloric calculation is mostly accurate, with minor errors that do not significantly impact the overall understanding.
Caloric calculation is accurate and complete, demonstrating a clear understanding of caloric values in foods and beverages.

No attempt to analyze nutritional value.
Nutritional analysis is attempted but is superficial, only mentioning basic food groups without detail.
Nutritional analysis identifies some key nutrients but lacks depth or accuracy in describing their roles.
Nutritional analysis is reasonably comprehensive, discussing macronutrients and some micronutrients with fair accuracy.
Nutritional analysis is thorough, accurately detailing the roles of macronutrients and micronutrients in the context of health.
Nutritional analysis is insightful, providing nuanced perspectives on the impact of specific nutrients and their interactions, showing excellent comprehension.
No connection made between food/beverage analysis and health standards.
Attempts to link analysis to health standards are vague or incorrect.
Links analysis to health standards with some inaccuracies.
Demonstrates a general understanding of health standards in the context of food/beverage analysis.
Clearly applies health standards to justify food/beverage analysis.
Insightfully and thoroughly applies health standards, demonstrating a deep understanding of nutrition's impact on well-being.
